alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Chilton; Shelby (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 29 at 9:47PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Chilton, southern Shelby and central Bibb Counties through 1030 PM CST... At 947 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Brierfield Ironworks Park, or near Montevallo, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Alabaster, Calera, Montevallo, Brent, Columbiana, Centreville, Jemison, West Blocton, Wilton, American Village, Ashby, Brierfield Ironworks Park, University Of Montevallo, Eoline, Shelby County Airport, Lay Lake, Lay Lake Dam, Shelby, Minooka Park and Waxahatchee Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for central and east central Alabama. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 400 AM CST for central and east central Alabama.
